Title: Mimic - A DWM Project
Description:
This is my very first project using WPF and the DWM API (Desktop Windows Manager, on Vista).
It allows to duplicate any windows.
It can be useful :
  - for people working with several screens,
  - to zoom on windows,
  - in some presentations
(Well... and it is an example of how to use the DWM API)
